TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Say-mang-zen塞芒人, title = Say-mang-zen塞芒人, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Say-mang-zen塞芒人} }

S.FORM: Say-mang " Semang" i kamu nu Ma-lay u tadah a kalung. Malay-ya u mapuletay nu lumeniay a tademaw, kakenihan itini i Malay-pandaw i teban nu buyuan, saan u satabalay nu Malay-pandaw a muenengay a tademaw, sakamusa taneng sipakayda inipitademan talaayawen kunipisausian tu cacay a mangan nu ayaw a mihcaan. pulung nu tademaw tusa a malebut a tdemawan.

Say-mang " Semang" i kamo no Ma-lay o tadah a kalong. Malay-ya o mapoletay no lomeniay a tademaw, kakenihan itini i Malay-pandaw i teban no boyoan, saan o satabalay no Malay-pandaw a moenengay a tademaw, sakamosa taneng sipakayda inipitademan talaayawen konipisaosian to cacay a mangan no ayaw a mihcaan. polong no tademaw tosa a malebot a tdemawan.
